attributes.action: Help a disabled child to get a suitable home
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
My son Thomas has been born with a congenital heart defect which has left him with special needs.
All the medical people who work with him say that to improve his and our quality of life we need to be moved to set up a sensory room to be able give OT treatment.
Thomas cant have medication as a 24 Hour ECG has shown he now has another heart problem so OT is he's only treatment.
SSDC have placed us in silver band which
means we will never be moved.
I have appealed but was turned down even with medical reports and letters in our favour and telling them what the problem is and that we need to move.

rejection.details: Whilst we have sympathy for your situation, the Prime Minister is unable to get involved in individual cases such as this.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
